video.title: Escalona
video.synopsis: The improbable real life of Rafael Escalona, who had no music education and became Colombia's king of vallenato music, chronicling everyday life.

episodes.synopsis: A body floating down the river is mistakenly believed to be Rafael Escalona, then a student at the local high school, and the whole town comes together.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Rafa wants it both ways: to have Maye to himself and to flirt with other girls. Meanwhile, Anastasio Espuelas seems to have moved to town.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Rafa returns to school with his friends after Maye gives him an ultimatum. Rafa's absence makes it easier for Anastasio to make his move.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: When their friend Miguel goes missing during a school break, Rafa refuses to believe Anastasio's assurances and recruits his friends to look for him.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Two important leaders from the capital, a liberal and a conservative, come for a visit. Maye satisfies her curiosity about Anastasio.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Rafa decides to not go back to school, the last straw for Maye. Pipe tries to keep him out of the black market. Anastasio strikes a deal with Pavajeau.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Rafa needs to find a job. But in trying to make an initial investment, he risks losing Pavajeau's prize rooster to Anastasio.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Maye can no longer contain her interest in Anastasio, but she gets a surprise when she and Pau visit. Rafa and Pipe make a bundle on their deal.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Everyone's stunned by Rafa's success, including Maye, who sort of takes him back. Meanwhile, El General courts Desideria, unaware of her love for Pipe.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Anastasio throws a big party and invites the town's bigwigs. La Vieja Sara attends under pressure. Rafa goes on a quest to prove his manliness to Maye.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Off in the jungle, Rafa runs into his old pal Miguel, who gives him a hand. Meanwhile, Anastasio continues to ingratiate himself with the townspeople.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Maye agrees to take Rafa back on one condition: He has to bring her his pet armadillo. Except that, while they were split, he gave it to another girl.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Anastasio thinks he's tricked Rafa into writing him a song for Maye. He also pressures Pavajeau for the money he owes, threatening to keep his rooster.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Rafa is forced to defend himself in court when he's accused of slandering an upright citizen. Then he and Maye go treasure hunting in the sierra.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: On the icy mountain top, Rafa, Maye and Miguel make an improbable discovery, but after Miguel speaks with the tribal chief, he swears them to secrecy.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Rafa and Maye return to town, where Sara chews out both of them. They make a decision, but a missing relic from a local church throws off their plan.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Anastasio has a plan to pull Maye away from Rafa and it appears to be working. Meanwhile, Pipe and Desideria grow closer.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Anastasio's plan is surprisingly effective. Rafa falls hard for Nara, with his friends running out of patience but still covering for him.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: A crestfallen Rafa, now a social outcast, can't seem to win back Maye. Desideria confronts her father about making decisions without consulting her.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: To cheer up Lili, Maye's heartbroken sister, Anastasio dreams up a beauty pageant. But Rafa and Pavajeau find a way to mess with Anastasio's event.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Rafa can't stand that Anastasio and Maye are engaged and he and Pavajeau go on a mad bender, wreaking havoc all over town.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Anastasio secretly pulls strings to get Rafa accused of being a local ravisher of young girls, forcing him to hide. But Maye doesn't believe it.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Rafa accepts Sara's offer to buy some of her land. But Anastasio plots against him again, even as his plans with Maye go forth.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Rafa goes on a wild bender after he overhears Maye and Pau at the bridal shop discussing the details of her wedding to Anastasio.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: As Maye and Anastasio prepare for their wedding, Rafa takes refuge with Miguel and Rosa María out in the wilds. A search for a tiger reveals a secret.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: With Sara on her deathbed, Maye and Anastasio's wedding must be postponed. Rafa rushes from the sierra to say goodbye to his and Maye's godmother.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Maye decides to take a trip to visit relatives and clear her head. Anastasio convinces a visitor that Molina is the only artist who can paint her.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Desideria's father is convinced Rafa is the reason she's in trouble, and only one person can convince him otherwise. Anastasio waits for Maye.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: El General makes Desideria and her family an extraordinarily generous offer. Rafa and Anastasio wait for Maye's decision.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Pipe makes an indecorous appearance at a local celebration, forcing Rafa and Pavajeau to maneuver around many of the town's illustrious citizens.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Alonso Doce unexpectedly challenges Pipe, who confesses his failures to Desideria. Rafa and his friends continue to celebrate, and then tragedy strikes.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: In the midst of celebrating engagements and mourning losses, Rafa and his pals discover Simón has been challenged to an accordion match.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Anastasio has one final, very eerie challenge for Rafa. Afterward, he, Maye, Pau and Pavajeau discuss their futures with Sara.
episodes.title: Episode 33
